0.cdata!: Ecuador - Prestamo para El Sector Agropecuario

abstracts.cdata!:
This Project Completion Repo: (PCR)
            reviews the Ecuador Agricultural Sector Loan for US$100
            million. The loan was approved by the Board of Directors on
            October 22, 1985. The original loan closing date of June 30,
            1988 was extended to June 30, 1989. Final disbursement was
            made on July 12, 1988. US$1.44 million was cancelled. The
            loan did relieve a serious foreign exchange constraint as
            intended, but it did not accomplish most of its policy
            conditions. Some temporary improvements in the terms of
            trade and export incentives were achieved through: (a) a
            reduction in quantitative restrictions and import duties for
            industry; (b) a reduction in export taxes for agricultural
            products; and (c) devaluation of the exchange rate. However,
            there was little or no permanent change in agricultural policy.
